Object.Table: SELECT TABLE_NAME AS Id,TABLE_NAME AS Name FROM `information_schema`.`TABLES` WHERE `TABLE_SCHEMA`='{db}'
Object.View: SELECT TABLE_NAME AS Id,TABLE_NAME AS Name FROM `information_schema`.`VIEWS` WHERE `TABLE_SCHEMA`='{db}'
Object.StoredProcedure: SELECT ROUTINE_NAME AS Id,ROUTINE_NAME AS Name FROM `information_schema`.`ROUTINES` WHERE `ROUTINE_SCHEMA`='{db}'

Property.Table: SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS Name, COLUMN_TYPE AS Type, COLUMN_KEY = 'PRI' AS IsKey,COLUMN_DEFAULT AS `Default`,COLUMN_COMMENT AS Note FROM `information_schema`.`COLUMNS` WHERE TABLE_NAME = '{ID}' AND TABLE_SCHEMA='{db}'
